name: Wilfa Classic+ Coffee Maker - Black
desc: Adjustable settings give you ultimate control over your flow rate and extraction time. Plus smart maintenance features remind you to clean the device, help you to conserve power, and prevent drips on the hot plate.

name: Clara French Press
desc: The cure for the common cafetière. Clara’s unique vacuum-insulated walls maintain the ideal brewing temperature for optimal extraction and keep your coffee hot for your second and third cups, while the enhanced mesh filtration makes them taste as smooth and silt-free as the first.

name: Perfect Pot
desc: Meet the pot that thought of everything and everyone.  We designed one (truly) perfect pot that combines every single pot and then some. Made with the same game-changing ingenuity that made the Always Pan a sellout,

name: Coffee Dripper - Tan Speckled
desc: Stoneware pour-over coffee dripper made with speckled tan clay, coated in a clear glossy glaze.

name: Hario V60 Buono Drip Kettle - 800ml
desc: Hario kettle is very popular amongst baristas, coffeehouses and coffee lovers at home. It is unique and very reliable, that is why it is highly rated by coffee experts worldwide. Hario is known to manufacture and invent brilliant coffee equipment, so it is not a accident that the Buono kettle is highly rated. You will not come across many better kettles than the V60 kettle from Hario.

name: NORDIC KITCHEN TIMER
desc: Keep a check on your cooking. Simple design for the kitchen surface. Matches the Nordic kitchen series.

name: Dyson Purifier Humidify+Cool Formaldehyde
desc: Automatically senses, captures, and traps pollutants for cleaner air. Detects and destroys formaldehyde¹

name: RIPPLE OPENER - BRASS
desc: A classic churchkey-style bottle opener milled from 5/8' diameter brass in Wisconsin. The wave-like profile provides extra purchase when in use, and also adds visual and tactile interest.
